subject: Golf
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: In 1946, Bill Powell built his own golf course after being denied access to the golf courses because of his race. On Wednesday he received the P.G.A. of America’s Distinguished Service Award.
snippet: In 1946, Bill Powell built his own golf course after being denied access to the golf courses because of his race. On Wednesday he received the P.G.A. of America’s Distinguished Service Award.
